document_data.name: Red Triumvirate
document_data.mainbody: The '''red triumvirate''' was a cabal of [[red dragon]]s during the [[Time of Dragons]].
document_data.Territory: They possessed lands to the south-east of the territory of King [[Orchtrien]].
document_data.Relationships: The red cabal was a foe of King Orchtrien.
document_data.Members: The red triumvirate was almost certainly made up of [[red dragon]]s.While the red triumvirate is never explicitly stated to be made up of red dragons, throughout the story it is stated that wyrms control almost all territory; thus, it is assumed for the purposes of this article that the triumvirate, and other forces facing King Orchtrien, are dragons.
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|-25090}}, the red triumvirate lost a significant battle to the forces of King Orchtrien.
